doc:
Aurora Mardiganian https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aurora_Mardiganian 0 Aurora (Arshaluys) Mardiganian (Armenian: Աուրորա [Արշալոյս] Մարտիկանեան; January 12, 1901, Çemişgezek, Mamuret-ül Aziz, Ottoman Empire – February 6, 1994, Los Angeles, California, United States) was an Armenian American author, actress and a survivor of the Armenian Genocide. Aurora ( Arshaluys ) Mardiganian ( Armenian : Աուրորա_[_Արշալոյս_]_Մարտիկանեան ; January_12_,_1901_,_Çemişgezek_,_Mamuret-ül_Aziz , Ottoman_Empire – February_6_,_1994 , Los_Angeles , California , United_States ) was an_Armenian_American_author , actress and a_survivor of the_Armenian_Genocide .
